TrouPotion(PotionSoin) - Method in class org.centrale.objet.WoE.Personnage

U

usagePotion(PotionSoin) - Method in class org.centrale.objet.WoE.Personnage
The process of using potion first, we will check whether there is potion in Knapsack, if no, program will printout "no potion" if yes, potion will be moved out of knapsack, and set as null to be collect as garbage

W

wolfie - Variable in class org.centrale.objet.WoE.World
Representing a Loup(Monstre) in the world
World - Class in org.centrale.objet.WoE
The class World represents a world that contains different roles like Personnage(Archer,Paysan, Guerrier) and Monstre(Lapin, Loup), the role Personnage can attack Monstre through the method combattre, it can also restore vitality through the use of PationSoin.
World() - Constructor for class org.centrale.objet.WoE.World
Default parameterless constructor
